page.title: 12THE EVENTIDE CLUB, UPHAM
page.content: The Eventide Club was formed in 1951 for ladies aged over 60 and gentlemen aged over 65. Members come from Upham, Bishops Waltham and Fair Oak. They meet on the first and third Thursdays of every month, when there is an interesting talk by a visiting speaker, or games of Skittles and Bingo, or Beetle Drives, or competitions. Each year they hold a birthday party in October; this year, 1985, the Club will celebrate its 34th.birthday. There is also a Christmas lunch, a concert by children from Upham School, and two half day and one whole day outings. Membership at present stands at twenty five. Meeting socially helps to ward off loneliness and provides an opportunity to give assistance and comfort when it is needed.
